query.sfwSql: SELECT SPAGH.*, PLN.PLAN_NAME AS PLAN_NAME, SCV.DESCRIPTION AS PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_DESCRIPTION, SCV1.DESCRIPTION AS LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_DESCRIPTION, SCV2.DESCRIPTION AS RATE_STRUCTURE_DESCRIPTION, SCV3.DESCRIPTION AS COBRA_TYPE_DESCRIPTION, SCV4.DESCRIPTION AS REASON_DESCRIPTION, SCV5.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS_DESCRIPTION, (SELECT TOP 1 SPAGH.COVERAGE_CODE + ' - ' + COVE.short_description FROM SGT_ORG_PLAN_GROUP_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_COVERAGE_REF COVE WHERE COVE.COVERAGE_CODE = SPAGH.COVERAGE_CODE) AS istrCovergeCode, EPOORG.ORG_NAME AS EPO_ORG_NAME,EPOORG.ORG_CODE AS EPO_ORG_CODE FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY SPAGH LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV SPAG ON SPAG.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=SPAGH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPAG.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN ON PLN.PLAN_ID=SPA.PLAN_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV ON SCV.CODE_VALUE=SPAGH.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE AND SCV.CODE_ID=337 LEFT JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV1 ON SCV1.CODE_VALUE=SPAGH.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE AND SCV1.CODE_ID=408 LEFT JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV2 ON SCV2.CODE_VALUE=SPAGH.RATE_STRUCTURE_VALUE AND SCV2.CODE_ID=411 LEFT JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV3 ON SCV3.CODE_VALUE=SPAGH.COBRA_TYPE_VALUE AND SCV3.CODE_ID=333 LEFT JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV4 ON SCV4.CODE_VALUE=SPAGH.REASON_VALUE AND SCV4.CODE_ID=332 LEFT JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV5 ON SCV5.CODE_VALUE=SPAGH.STATUS_VALUE AND SCV5.CODE_ID=336 LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION EPOORG ON SPAGH.EPO_ORG_ID = EPOORG.ORG_ID WHERE SPAGH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=@PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID ORDER BY ISNULL(SPAGH.END_DATE,'2900-01-01') DESC, SPAGH.START_DATE DESC,SPAGH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID DESC
select distinct org.* from sgs_code_value cv inner join sgt_organization org on org.org_code=cv.data1 where cv.code_id=415

SELECT TOP 1 PREMIUM_AMT FROM SGT_ORG_PLAN_HMO_RATE WHERE ORG_PLAN_ID=@ORG_PLAN_ID AND HMO_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE=@HMO_TYPE AND EMP_CATEGORY_VALUE=@EMP_CATEGORY AND LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE=@LOC AND EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @EFFECTIVE_DATE order by EFFECTIVE_DATE desc

SELECT TOP 1 PREMIUM_AMT FROM SGT_ORG_PLAN_DENTAL_RATE WHERE DENTAL_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE=@DENTAL_INSR_TYPE AND LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE=@LOC AND ORG_PLAN_ID=@ORG_PLAN_ID and EFFECTIVE_DATE <=@EFFECTIVE_DATE order by EFFECTIVE_DATE desc

SELECT TOP 1 PREMIUM_AMT FROM SGT_ORG_PLAN_VISION_RATE WHERE VISION_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE=@VISION_INSR_TYPE AND LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE=@LOC AND ORG_PLAN_ID=@ORG_PLAN_ID and EFFECTIVE_DATE<=@EFFECTIVE_DATE order by EFFECTIVE_DATE desc

SELECT SPD.*,SPAD.* FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT SPAD WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH (NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPAD.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_DEPENDENT SPD WITH (NOLOCK) ON SPD.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID=SPAD.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID IN (12,16,17) AND SPD.RELATIONSHIP_VALUE IN ('CHLD','SCLD','ADCH','GRCH') AND SPA.END_DATE IS NULL AND SPAD.END_DATE IS NULL AND ISNULL(SPD.SPECIAL_NEED_RESIDENT_FACILITY_FLAG,'N') <> 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT EMP INNER JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION ORG ON ORG.ORG_ID = EMP.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV ON CV.DATA1 = ORG.ORG_CODE AND CV.CODE_ID = 7022 WHERE EMP.PERSON_ID = SPA.PERSON_ID )

SELECT * FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER ON SPA.PERSON_ID = PER.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN P ON SPA.PLAN_ID = P.PLAN_ID WHERE (GHDV.DENTAL_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE='CB16' OR GHDV.VISION_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE='COBR' OR GHDV.COBRA_TYPE_VALUE IS NOT NULL) AND SPA.COBRA_EXPIRATION_DATE IS NOT NULL AND (MONTH(SPA.COBRA_EXPIRATION_DATE)=MONTH(DATEADD(MONTH,1,GETDATE())) AND YEAR(SPA.COBRA_EXPIRATION_DATE)=YEAR(DATEADD(MONTH,1,GETDATE()))) AND --PIR 18424 --ISNULL(SPA.REASON_VALUE,'') !='ECOP' AND SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT EMP INNER JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION ORG ON ORG.ORG_ID = EMP.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV ON CV.DATA1 = ORG.ORG_CODE AND CV.CODE_ID = 7022 WHERE EMP.PERSON_ID = PER.PERSON_ID )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SGT_ORGANIZATION ORG INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV ON CV.CODE_ID=415 WHERE CV.DATA1=@EPO_PROVIDER AND CV.DATA3=@ZIP_CODE

SELECT SPA.*,MEMB.PERSON_ID,MEMB.DATE_OF_BIRTH,GHDV.*,SPD.*,DEP.PERSON_ID,DEP.DATE_OF_BIRTH,SPAD.*,SPD.MEDICARE_AGE_65_LETTER_SENT_FLAG AS istrMedicareAge65LetterSentFlagDependent FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY GHDVH ON GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDVH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND GHDVH.END_DATE IS NULL AND GHDVH.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND GHDVH.HEALTH_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE IS NOT NULL INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON MEMB ON MEMB.PERSON_ID=SPA.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ELECTION SPAPE ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPAPE.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT SPAD ON SPAD.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID AND SPAD.END_DATE IS NULL LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON_DEPENDENT SPD ON SPD.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID=SPAD.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON DEP ON SPD.DEPENDENT_PERSLINK_ID=DEP.PERSON_ID WHERE (((SPD.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID IS NOT NULL ) AND (ISNULL(SPD.MEDICARE_AGE_65_LETTER_SENT_FLAG,'N') != 'Y') AND (ISNULL(DEP.DATE_OF_BIRTH,SPD.DATE_OF_BIRTH) < GETDATE() - (365 *64)) AND SPAD.END_DATE IS NULL AND GHDV.COBRA_TYPE_VALUE IS NOT NULL AND SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND SPA.PLAN_ID=12 AND SPAPE.IBS_FLAG = 'Y') OR (((ISNULL(SPD.MEDICARE_AGE_65_LETTER_SENT_FLAG,'N') != 'Y') AND (ISNULL(DEP.DATE_OF_BIRTH,SPD.DATE_OF_BIRTH) < GETDATE() - (365*64)))) AND SPAD.END_DATE IS NULL AND GHDV.HEALTH_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE = 'RT12' AND SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND SPA.PLAN_ID=12 AND SPAPE.IBS_FLAG = 'Y') OR (((ISNULL(GHDV.MEDICARE_AGE_65_LETTER_SENT_FLAG,'N') != 'Y') AND (MEMB.DATE_OF_BIRTH < GETDATE() - (365*64)) AND GHDV.COBRA_TYPE_VALUE IS NOT NULL AND SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND SPA.PLAN_ID=12 AND SPAPE.IBS_FLAG = 'Y') OR ((ISNULL(GHDV.MEDICARE_AGE_65_LETTER_SENT_FLAG,'N') != 'Y') AND (MEMB.DATE_OF_BIRTH < GETDATE() - (365*64)) AND GHDV.HEALTH_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE = 'RT12' AND SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND SPA.PLAN_ID=12 AND SPAPE.IBS_FLAG = 'Y')) ORDER BY MEMB.PERSON_ID

SELECT GHDV.* FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL SPAED ON SPAED.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL SPED ON SPED.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID=SPAED.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT SPE ON SPE.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID=SPED.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID WHERE SPE.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID=@PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID

SELECT * FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON PER.PERSON_ID=PA.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON PLN.PLAN_ID=PA.PLAN_ID WHERE PA.PLAN_ID=22 AND PA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE in ('ENL2','SUS3','CAN2') AND GHDV.INCLUDED_TO_HMO_FILE_FLAG != 'Y'

SELECT PA.*,GHDV.*,PER.*,PLN.* FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ELECTION SPAPE WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAPE.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON PER.PERSON_ID=PA.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON PLN.PLAN_ID=PA.PLAN_ID WHERE PA.PLAN_ID IN (12,16,17) AND ISNULL(GHDV.MODIFIED_AFTER_TFFR_FILE_SENT_FLAG,'Y')='Y' AND SPAPE.PAYMENT_METHOD_VALUE='TFPC'

SELECT distinct SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE AS HEADER_PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE, CASE WHEN DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE THEN HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE ELSE SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE END AS PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE, CASE WHEN HISTORY1.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE ELSE CASE WHEN HISTORY2.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN HISTORY2.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE ELSE HISTORY1.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE END END AS CURRENT_LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE, CASE WHEN HISTORY1.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.DENTAL_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE ELSE CASE WHEN HISTORY2.DENTAL_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN HISTORY2.DENTAL_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE ELSE HISTORY1.DENTAL_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE END END AS CURRENT_DENTAL_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE, CASE WHEN HISTORY1.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.START_DATE ELSE CASE WHEN HISTORY2.START_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN HISTORY2.START_DATE ELSE HISTORY1.START_DATE END END AS CURRENT_PLAN_START_DATE_FROM_HISTORY, CASE WHEN HISTORY1.END_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.END_DATE ELSE CASE WHEN HISTORY2.END_DATE IS NOT NULL --and DATEADD(DAY,30,@BATCH_DATE) BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE and HISTORY2.END_DATE THEN HISTORY2.END_DATE ELSE HISTORY1.END_DATE END END AS CURRENT_PLAN_END_DATE_FROM_HISTORY, HISTORY2.START_DATE AS PREVIOUS_HISTORY_START_DATE, GHDV.*, SPA.*, PER.*, PLN.* FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ID=PER.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PLAN_ID=PLN.PLAN_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND END_DATE IS NULL --and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,30,@BATCH_DATE) ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID DESC) --ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID and (START_DATE <= HISTORY1.start_date and PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID < HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID) and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID DESC) --ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID=16 AND SPA.STATUS_VALUE='VALD' AND ( 'ENL2' = CASE WHEN DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE THEN HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE WHEN HISTORY1.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE END OR (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'SUS3' AND ((SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE < @LAST_DAY_OF_CURRENT_MONTH AND ISNULL(GHDV.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG,'N')='Y') OR (SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE BETWEEN @FIRST_DAY_OF_CURRENT_MONTH AND @LAST_DAY_OF_CURRENT_MONTH) OR (HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE)) ) )

SELECT * FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ID=PER.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PLAN_ID=PLN.PLAN_ID WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID=17 AND SPA.STATUS_VALUE='VALD'AND ((SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2') OR (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'SUS3' AND ISNULL(GHDV.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG,'N')='Y' AND SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE <='12/31/2010'))

SELECT distinct SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE AS HEADER_PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE, CASE WHEN @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE THEN HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE ELSE SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE END AS 'PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE', GHDV.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG, GHDV.MEDICARE_CLAIM_NO AS 'MBR_CLAIM_NO', CASE WHEN HISTORY1.COVERAGE_CODE != HISTORY2.COVERAGE_CODE AND HISTORY2.COVERAGE_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS 'IS_LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_MODIFIED', CASE WHEN HISTORY1.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'SUS3' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS 'IS_REINSTATEMENT', GHDV.*,SPA.*,PER.*,PLN.*--,PAPE.* FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ID=PER.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PLAN_ID=PLN.PLAN_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID --and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE)--Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) --Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 AND START_DATE < HISTORY1.START_DATE --AND PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID < HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) LEFT JOIN sgt_person_account_payment_election pape WITH(NOLOCK) on spa.person_account_id = pape.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID=12 AND SPA.STATUS_VALUE='VALD' AND ( (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2') OR (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'SUS3' AND ((SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE < @LAST_DAY_OF_CURRENT_MONTH AND ISNULL(GHDV.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG,'N')='Y') OR (SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE BETWEEN @FIRST_DAY_OF_CURRENT_MONTH AND @LAST_DAY_OF_CURRENT_MONTH) OR (HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE)) ) ) AND (HISTORY1.PROVIDER_ORG_ID = 2408) AND HISTORY1.START_DATE < '2015-07-01 00:00:00.000'

SELECT distinct SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE AS HEADER_PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE,
CASE WHEN DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE THEN HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE ELSE SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE END AS PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE,
CASE WHEN HISTORY1.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE ELSE CASE WHEN HISTORY2.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN HISTORY2.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE ELSE HISTORY1.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE END END AS LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE,
CASE WHEN HISTORY1.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.VISION_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE ELSE CASE WHEN HISTORY2.VISION_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN HISTORY2.VISION_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE ELSE HISTORY1.VISION_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE END END AS VISION_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE,
CASE WHEN HISTORY1.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.START_DATE ELSE CASE WHEN HISTORY2.START_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN HISTORY2.START_DATE ELSE HISTORY1.START_DATE END END AS CURRENT_PLAN_START_DATE_FROM_HISTORY,
CASE WHEN HISTORY1.END_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.END_DATE ELSE CASE WHEN HISTORY2.END_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN HISTORY2.END_DATE ELSE HISTORY1.END_DATE END END AS CURRENT_PLAN_END_DATE_FROM_HISTORY, HISTORY2.START_DATE AS PREVIOUS_HISTORY_START_DATE,
GHDV.*, SPA.*, PER.*, PLN.*
FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ID=PER.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PLAN_ID=PLN.PLAN_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID --and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,30,@BATCH_DATE) AND END_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID DESC) LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID and (START_DATE <= HISTORY1.start_date and PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID < HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID) and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID DESC)
WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID=17 AND SPA.STATUS_VALUE='VALD' AND ( 'ENL2' = CASE WHEN DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE THEN HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE WHEN HISTORY1.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE END OR (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'SUS3' AND ((SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE < @LAST_DAY_OF_CURRENT_MONTH AND ISNULL(GHDV.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG,'N')='Y' AND SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE >'12/31/2010') OR (SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE BETWEEN @FIRST_DAY_OF_CURRENT_MONTH AND @LAST_DAY_OF_CURRENT_MONTH) OR (HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE)) ) )

--PIR 2187 SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT SPA INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SP ON SP.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=@PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID AND SP.PERSON_ID=SPA.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID WHERE SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=@PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID
SELECT MAX(EFFECTIVE_DATE) FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_INSURANCE_CONTRIBUTION WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=@PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID

UPDATE SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV SET IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG='N' WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID IN (SELECT GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE GHDV.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG='Y' AND SPA.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID)

select distinct (per.person_id) as iintMemberPerslinkId, ISNULL(per.last_name,'') +', '+ ISNULL(per.first_name,'') +' '+ ISNULL(per.middle_name,'') as istrPersonName, p.plan_name as istrPlan, isnull((select distinct top 1 short_description from SGT_ORG_PLAN_GROUP_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_COVERAGE_REF WITH(NOLOCK) where coverage_code = pag.coverage_code) ,cv1.DESCRIPTION) as istrCoverageCode, pa.history_change_date as ChangeEffectiveDate from sgt_person_account_employment_detail paed WITH(NOLOCK) inner join sgt_person_account pa WITH(NOLOCK) on pa.person_account_id = paed.person_account_id inner join sgt_plan p WITH(NOLOCK) on p.plan_id = pa.plan_id and pa.plan_id in (12,16,17) inner join sgt_person per WITH(NOLOCK) on per.person_id = pa.person_id inner join sgt_person_account_ghdv pag WITH(NOLOCK) on pag.person_account_id = pa.person_account_id and ((pa.plan_id in (16,17) and level_of_coverage_value not in ( 'IN16', 'INDV')) or ((pa.plan_id = 12) and coverage_code not in ('0001','0004','0006','0021','0024','0041','0044'))) left outer join sgs_code_value cv1 WITH(NOLOCK) on cv1.code_id = pag.level_of_coverage_id and cv1.code_value=level_of_coverage_value where paed.election_value = 'ENLD' and pa.plan_participation_status_value = 'ENL2' AND ((pa.start_date < @batch_run_date) and (@batch_run_date < isnull(pa.end_date,'01/01/2900') )) and (((select count(*) from sgt_person_account_dependent WITH(NOLOCK) where person_account_id = pa.person_account_id and end_date is null ) = 0) or ((select count(*) from sgt_person_account_dependent WITH(NOLOCK) where person_account_id = pa.person_account_id) =0)) order by per.person_id, istrPersonName, istrPlan desc

SELECT CASE WHEN DEP.DEPENDENT_PERSLINK_ID IS NULL THEN ISNULL(DEP.FIRST_NAME,'')+' '+ISNULL(DEP.MIDDLE_NAME,'')+' '+ISNULL(DEP.LAST_NAME,'') ELSE ISNULL(DEPPER.FIRST_NAME,'')+' '+ISNULL(DEPPER.MIDDLE_NAME,'')+' '+ISNULL(DEPPER.LAST_NAME,'') END AS 'DEP_NAME', PA.*, DEP.*, DEPPER.* FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT PA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_DEPENDENT DEP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PA.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID=DEP.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON DEPPER WITH(NOLOCK) ON DEP.DEPENDENT_PERSLINK_ID=DEPPER.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID= (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) --Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID= (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND START_DATE < HISTORY1.START_DATE --PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID < HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) --Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID=12 AND SPA.STATUS_VALUE='VALD' AND ( (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2')-- AND SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE)) --Commented to handle future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 OR (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'SUS3' AND ((SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE < DATEADD(S,-1,DATEADD(MM, DATEDIFF(M,0,@BATCH_DATE)+1,0)) AND ISNULL(GHDV.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG,'N')='Y') OR (SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(DD,-(DAY(@BATCH_DATE)-1),@BATCH_DATE) AND DATEADD(S,-1,DATEADD(MM, DATEDIFF(M,0,@BATCH_DATE)+1,0))) OR (HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE)) ) OR PA.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG='Y' ) AND (HISTORY1.PROVIDER_ORG_ID = 2408) AND HISTORY1.START_DATE < '2015-07-01 00:00:00.000' ORDER BY PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID, ISNULL(DEP.DATE_OF_BIRTH,DEPPER.DATE_OF_BIRTH) --AND (PA.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) OR ISNULL(PA.END_DATE,'99991231') <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE))-- Commented to handle future dated enrollment scenario

SELECT PA.* FROM SGT_PERSON_ADDRESS PA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ID= PA.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) ON GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID= (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) --Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 ORDER BY PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID DESC) LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID= (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID < HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) --Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 ORDER BY PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID DESC) WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID=12 AND SPA.STATUS_VALUE='VALD' AND ( (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' ) OR (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'SUS3' AND ((SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE < DATEADD(S,-1,DATEADD(MM, DATEDIFF(M,0,@BATCH_DATE)+1,0)) AND ISNULL(GHDV.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG,'N')='Y') OR (SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE BETWEEN CONVERT(DATETIME,(CONVERT(VARCHAR(25),DATEADD(DD,-(DAY(@BATCH_DATE)-1),@BATCH_DATE),101)),110) --DATEADD(DD,-(DAY(@BATCH_DATE)-1),@BATCH_DATE) AND DATEADD(S,-1,DATEADD(MM, DATEDIFF(M,0,@BATCH_DATE)+1,0))) OR (HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE)) ) ) AND (PA.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) OR ISNULL(PA.END_DATE,'99991231') <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE)) ORDER BY PA.PERSON_ID,PA.START_DATE DESC

SELECT EMP.*,EMPDET.*,PAEMP.*,ORG.* FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) ON GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL PAEMP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=PAEMP.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL EMPDET WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAEMP.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID=EMPDET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT EMP WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMPDET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID=EMP.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION ORG WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMP.ORG_ID=ORG.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID= (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID --and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) --Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID= (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND START_DATE < HISTORY1.START_DATE --PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID < HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) --Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID=12 AND SPA.STATUS_VALUE='VALD' AND ( (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2')-- AND SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE)) --Commented to handle future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 OR (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'SUS3' AND ((SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE < DATEADD(S,-1,DATEADD(MM, DATEDIFF(M,0,@BATCH_DATE)+1,0)) AND ISNULL(GHDV.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG,'N')='Y') OR (SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(DD,-(DAY(@BATCH_DATE)-1),@BATCH_DATE) AND DATEADD(S,-1,DATEADD(MM, DATEDIFF(M,0,@BATCH_DATE)+1,0))) OR (HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE)) ) ) AND (EMP.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) OR ISNULL(EMP.END_DATE,'99991231') <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE)) AND (HISTORY1.PROVIDER_ORG_ID = 2408 ) AND HISTORY1.START_DATE < '2015-07-01 00:00:00.000' ORDER BY EMP.PERSON_ID,EMP.START_DATE DESC

SELECT DISTINCT OP.* FROM SGT_ORG_PLAN OP WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT EMP WITH(NOLOCK) ON OP.ORG_ID= EMP.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL EMPDET WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMP.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID=EMPDET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL PAEMP WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMPDET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID=PAEMP.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAEMP.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY1 ON HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID= (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) ----Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY2 ON HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID= (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND START_DATE < HISTORY1.START_DATE --PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID < HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) ----Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) WHERE OP.PLAN_ID=12 AND SPA.PLAN_ID=12 AND SPA.STATUS_VALUE='VALD' AND ( (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2')-- AND SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE)) OR (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'SUS3' AND ((SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE < DATEADD(S,-1,DATEADD(MM, DATEDIFF(M,0,@BATCH_DATE)+1,0)) AND ISNULL(GHDV.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG,'N')='Y') OR (SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(DD,-(DAY(@BATCH_DATE)-1),@BATCH_DATE) AND DATEADD(S,-1,DATEADD(MM, DATEDIFF(M,0,@BATCH_DATE)+1,0))) OR (HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE)) ) ) AND @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN SPA.START_DATE AND ISNULL(SPA.END_DATE,'01/01/2900') AND @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN EMPDET.START_DATE AND ISNULL(EMPDET.END_DATE,'01/01/2900') AND @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN EMP.START_DATE AND ISNULL(EMP.END_DATE,'01/01/2900') AND (@BATCH_DATE BETWEEN OP.PARTICIPATION_START_DATE AND ISNULL(OP.PARTICIPATION_END_DATE,'01/01/2900') OR (OP.PARTICIPATION_START_DATE > @BATCH_DATE AND OP.PARTICIPATION_END_DATE IS NULL)) -- PROD PIR 7769 AND (HISTORY1.PROVIDER_ORG_ID = 2408 ) AND HISTORY1.START_DATE < '2015-07-01 00:00:00.000'

SELECT DISTINCT P.*,PA.*,GHDV.* FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA WITH(NOLOCK) ON GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON P WITH(NOLOCK) ON PA.PERSON_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT PAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAD.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_DEPENDENT PD WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAD.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID = PD.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID WHERE ((GHDV.MEDICARE_CLAIM_NO IS NULL AND PD.MEDICARE_CLAIM_NO IS NOT NULL) OR (GHDV.MEDICARE_CLAIM_NO IS NOT NULL AND PD.MEDICARE_CLAIM_NO IS NULL)) AND (GHDV.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG = 'Y' OR PAD.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG = 'Y') ORDER BY P.PERSON_ID

SELECT SPAD.*,SPD.* FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT SPAD WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_DEPENDENT SPD WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAD.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID=SPD.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAD.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID AND SPA.STATUS_VALUE='VALD' AND ISNULL(SPAD.IS_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG,'N') != 'Y' AND ((SPAD.END_DATE IS NULL OR SPAD.END_DATE >= @BATCH_DATE) or (SPAD.END_DATE < @BATCH_DATE and DATEADD(DAY,30,SPAD.MODIFIED_DATE) >= @BATCH_DATE))

SELECT * FROM SGT_PERSON_DEPENDENT SPD WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT SPAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAD.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID=SPD.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPAD.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) ON GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID = 12 AND SPD.DEPENDENT_PERSLINK_ID IN ( SELECT SPA.PERSON_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ID=PER.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PLAN_ID=PLN.PLAN_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID= (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) ----Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID= (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND START_DATE < HISTORY1.START_DATE --PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID < HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) ----Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) LEFT JOIN sgt_person_account_payment_election pape WITH(NOLOCK) on spa.person_account_id = pape.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID=12 AND SPA.STATUS_VALUE='VALD' AND ( (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2') OR (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'SUS3' AND ((SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE < DATEADD(S,-1,DATEADD(MM, DATEDIFF(M,0,@BATCH_DATE)+1,0)) AND ISNULL(GHDV.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG,'N')='Y') OR (SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(DD,-(DAY(@BATCH_DATE)-1),@BATCH_DATE) AND DATEADD(S,-1,DATEADD(MM, DATEDIFF(M,0,@BATCH_DATE)+1,0))) OR (HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE)) ) ) AND (HISTORY1.PROVIDER_ORG_ID = 2408 ) AND HISTORY1.START_DATE < '2015-07-01 00:00:00.000' )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY PA.PERSON_ID ORDER BY CASE WHEN ADDRESS_TYPE_VALUE = 'TEMP' AND ( CONVERT(DATETIME,PA.START_DATE,101) <= CONVERT(DATETIME,GETDATE(),101) AND CONVERT(DATETIME, isnull(PA.END_DATE,'99991231'),101) >= CONVERT(DATETIME,GETDATE(),101)) THEN 0 WHEN ADDRESS_TYPE_VALUE = 'PERM' AND (PA.END_DATE IS NULL) THEN 1 WHEN ADDRESS_TYPE_VALUE = 'PERM' AND PA.END_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN 2 ELSE 3 END, PA.END_DATE DESC) AS SR_NO, PA.* FROM SGT_PERSON_ADDRESS PA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ID= PA.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) ON GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID AND SPA.STATUS_VALUE='VALD' ) TEMP where SR_NO = 1

SELECT EMP.*,EMPDET.*,PAEMP.*,ORG.* FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) ON GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL PAEMP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=PAEMP.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL EMPDET WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAEMP.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID=EMPDET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT EMP WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMPDET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID=EMP.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION ORG WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMP.ORG_ID=ORG.ORG_ID WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID AND SPA.STATUS_VALUE='VALD' ORDER BY EMPDET.START_DATE DESC

--2ND TABLE TEMP TABLE (USED FOR INPUT TO THE 2ND TABLE--RETURNS DISTINCT RECORDS FROM TABLES HOLDING INFORMATION ABOUT POLICY HOLDER'S DEPENDENTS) DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #CGDEPENDENTTEMP SELECT DISTINCT PER.PERSON_ID, DEP.DEPENDENT_PERSLINK_ID DEPPERSID,GHDV.COVERAGE_CODE, DEP.MEDICARE_CLAIM_NO DEPMEDCLAIMNO,CASE WHEN DEP.MEDICARE_CLAIM_NO IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS MEDICARE_SUM, CASE WHEN DEP.MEDICARE_CLAIM_NO IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS NON_MEDICARE_SUM INTO #CGDEPENDENTTEMP FROM SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PERACCT WITH(NOLOCK) ON PERACCT.PERSON_ID = PER.PERSON_ID AND PERACCT.PLAN_ID = 12 AND PERACCT.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) ON GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PERACCT.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT PERDEP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PERDEP.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PERACCT.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_DEPENDENT DEP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PERDEP.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID = DEP.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT PAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAD.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID = DEP.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID AND ISNULL(PAD.END_DATE,'12/12/2999') > getdate() --'2023-03-01' INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON CV.DATA1 = GHDV.COVERAGE_CODE AND CV.CODE_ID = 1922 -- WHERE PER.PERSON_ID IN (3759,9125, 8752, 5647) --= 5647 ORDER BY PER.PERSON_ID
--MAIN QUERY: RETURNS SELECTED RECORDS FROM TWO TABLES (WHICH ARE COMBINED WITH A UNION) SELECT PER.PERSON_ID, PER.LAST_NAME + ', ' + PER.MIDDLE_NAME + ' ' + PER.FIRST_NAME AS MEMBER_NAME, MED.COVERAGE_CODE, MED.MEDICARE_SUM AS MEDICARE_SUM, MED.NON_MEDICARE_SUM AS NON_MEDICARE_SUM, cv.DATA3 AS MEDICARE_ENROLLEES FROM SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK)
INNER JOIN ( --1ST TABLE: RETURNS POLICY HOLDER INFORMATION SELECT PERSON_ID,COVERAGE_CODE,SUM(MEDICARE_SUM) AS MEDICARE_SUM,SUM(NON_MEDICARE_SUM) AS NON_MEDICARE_SUM FROM ( SELECT PER.PERSON_ID,GHDV.COVERAGE_CODE,SUM(CASE WHEN GHDV.MEDICARE_CLAIM_NO IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS MEDICARE_SUM, SUM(CASE WHEN GHDV.MEDICARE_CLAIM_NO IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS NON_MEDICARE_SUM FROM SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PERACCT WITH(NOLOCK) ON PERACCT.PERSON_ID = PER.PERSON_ID AND PERACCT.PLAN_ID = 12 AND PERACCT.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) ON GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PERACCT.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON CV.DATA1 = GHDV.COVERAGE_CODE AND CV.CODE_ID = 1922 GROUP BY PER.PERSON_ID,GHDV.COVERAGE_CODE
UNION ALL
--2ND TABLE: RETURNS POLICY HOLDER DEPENDENT INFORMATION (FROM 2ND TABLE TEMP TABLE USED FOR UNION WITH 1ST TABLE--sums up distinct dependent records by policy holder person_ID) SELECT cgDT.PERSON_ID,cgDT.COVERAGE_CODE,SUM(CASE WHEN cgDT.DepMedClaimNo IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS MEDICARE_SUM, SUM(CASE WHEN cgDT.DepMedClaimNo IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS NON_MEDICARE_SUM FROM #cgDependentTemp cgDT GROUP BY cgDT.PERSON_ID, cgDT.COVERAGE_CODE ) TEMP
GROUP BY PERSON_ID,COVERAGE_CODE ) MED ON MED.PERSON_ID = PER.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON CV.DATA1 = COVERAGE_CODE AND CV.CODE_ID = 1922
--WHERE CRITERIA BELOW RETURNS RECORDS WHERE: 1)EITHER Medicare count OR Non-Medicare count = 0, --OR 2)Medicare count <> Coverage code count WHERE MEDICARE_SUM < 1 OR NON_MEDICARE_SUM < 1 OR CAST(CV.DATA3 AS INT) <> MEDICARE_SUM
--CLEAN UP DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #CGDEPENDENTTEMP
/* CODE_VALUES
CODE_ID CODE_VALUE DESCRIPTION DATA1 DATA2 DATA3 1922 ME67 GAP 4 Medicare + Others 67 51 4 1922 ME66 GAP 3 Medicare + Others 66 50 3 1922 ME55 Medicare Split - 0055 55 50 3 1922 ME56 Medicare Split - 0056 56 53 3 1922 ME65 GAP 2 Medicare + Others 65 42 2 1922 ME49 Medicare Split - 0049 49 42 2 1922 ME52 Medicare Split - 0052 52 47 2 1922 ME48 Medicare Split - 0048 48 46 1 >>>>1922 ME43 Medicare Split - 0043 43 41 1 1922 ME64 GAP 1 Medicare + Others 64 41 1
*/

SELECT DISTINCT GHDV.*,PA.* FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HIST WITH(NOLOCK) ON GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = HIST.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA WITH(NOLOCK) ON GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT EMP ON EMP.PERSON_ID=PA.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL PED ON PED.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID=EMP.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID WHERE HIST.ALTERNATE_STRUCTURE_CODE_VALUE = 'HDHP' --AND DATEPART(YEAR,HIST.START_DATE) = DATEPART(YEAR,@BATCH_RUN_DATE) AND (HIST.START_DATE <> HIST.END_DATE OR HIST.END_DATE IS NULL) AND DATEDIFF(DAY,@BATCH_RUN_DATE,ISNULL(GHDV.HSA_EFFECTIVE_DATE,@BATCH_RUN_DATE)) <= 15 AND (((HIST.HSA_ENROLLMENT_FLAG IS NULL OR HIST.HSA_ENROLLMENT_FLAG = 'N') AND PED.END_DATE IS not NULL ) OR PED.END_DATE IS NULL )

DECLARE @PERSONACCOUNTID INT SELECT @PERSONACCOUNTID = FROM_PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT WHERE PERSON_ID = @DEPENDENT_PERSLINK_ID AND PLAN_ID = 12
SELECT TOP 1 HIS.* FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HIS WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) ON HIS.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = @PERSONACCOUNTID WHERE HIS.[START_DATE] != ISNULL(HIS.END_DATE, '99991231') ORDER BY HIS.[START_DATE] DESC, ISNULL(HIS.END_DATE, '99991231') DESC

SELECT distinct SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE AS HEADER_PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE,
CASE WHEN DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE THEN HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE ELSE SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE END AS 'PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE',
GHDV.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG,
CASE WHEN HISTORY1.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.MEDICARE_CLAIM_NO ELSE HISTORY2.MEDICARE_CLAIM_NO END AS MEDICARE_CLAIM_NO,
CASE WHEN HISTORY1.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.medicare_part_a_effective_date ELSE HISTORY2.medicare_part_a_effective_date END AS medicare_part_a_effective_date,
CASE WHEN HISTORY1.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.medicare_part_b_effective_date ELSE HISTORY2.medicare_part_b_effective_date END AS medicare_part_b_effective_date,
CASE WHEN HISTORY1.COVERAGE_CODE != HISTORY2.COVERAGE_CODE AND HISTORY2.COVERAGE_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS 'IS_LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_MODIFIED',
CASE WHEN HISTORY1.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'SUS3' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS 'IS_REINSTATEMENT',
CASE WHEN HISTORY1.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE ELSE HISTORY2.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE END AS LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE,
CASE WHEN HISTORY1.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.HEALTH_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE ELSE HISTORY2.HEALTH_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE END AS HEALTH_INSURANCE_TYPE_VALUE,
CASE WHEN HISTORY1.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.COBRA_TYPE_VALUE ELSE HISTORY2.COBRA_TYPE_VALUE END AS COBRA_TYPE_VALUE,
CASE WHEN HISTORY1.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.REASON_VALUE ELSE HISTORY2.REASON_VALUE END AS REASON_VALUE,
CASE WHEN HISTORY1.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.START_DATE ELSE HISTORY2.START_DATE END AS HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE,
CASE WHEN HISTORY1.Start_date <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.overridden_structure_code ELSE HISTORY2.overridden_structure_code END AS overridden_structure_code,
CASE WHEN HISTORY1.Start_date <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.coverage_code ELSE HISTORY2.coverage_code END AS coverage_code,
CASE WHEN HISTORY1.Start_date <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.rate_structure_code ELSE HISTORY2.rate_structure_code END AS rate_structure_code,
HISTORY2.START_DATE AS PREVIOUS_HISTORY_START_DATE,
GHDV.*,SPA.*,PER.*,PLN.*--,PAPE.* FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ID=PER.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PLAN_ID=PLN.PLAN_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID --and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,30,@BATCH_DATE) and end_date is null ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID /*and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE)*/ --Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 and START_DATE < HISTORY1.start_date AND START_DATE != END_DATE --PIR 23926 ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) LEFT JOIN sgt_person_account_payment_election pape WITH(NOLOCK) on spa.person_account_id = pape.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID=12 AND SPA.STATUS_VALUE='VALD' AND (
( 'ENL2' = CASE WHEN DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE THEN HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE WHEN HISTORY1.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,31,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE END ) OR (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'SUS3' AND ((SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE < @LAST_DAY_OF_CURRENT_MONTH AND ISNULL(GHDV.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG,'N')='Y') OR (SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE BETWEEN @FIRST_DAY_OF_CURRENT_MONTH AND @LAST_DAY_OF_CURRENT_MONTH) OR (HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE)) ) ) AND (HISTORY1.PROVIDER_ORG_ID = 5946 )

SELECT CASE WHEN DEP.DEPENDENT_PERSLINK_ID IS NULL THEN ISNULL(DEP.FIRST_NAME,'')+' '+ISNULL(DEP.MIDDLE_NAME,'')+' '+ISNULL(DEP.LAST_NAME,'') ELSE ISNULL(DEPPER.FIRST_NAME,'')+' '+ISNULL(DEPPER.MIDDLE_NAME,'')+' '+ISNULL(DEPPER.LAST_NAME,'') END AS 'DEP_NAME', PA.*, DEP.*, DEPPER.* FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT PA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_DEPENDENT DEP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PA.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID=DEP.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON DEPPER WITH(NOLOCK) ON DEP.DEPENDENT_PERSLINK_ID=DEPPER.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID= (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) --Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID= (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID and START_DATE < HISTORY1.start_date AND START_DATE != END_DATE --PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID < HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) --Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID=12 AND SPA.STATUS_VALUE='VALD' AND ( (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2')-- AND SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE)) --Commented to handle future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 OR (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'SUS3' AND ((SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE < DATEADD(S,-1,DATEADD(MM, DATEDIFF(M,0,@BATCH_DATE)+1,0)) AND ISNULL(GHDV.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG,'N')='Y') OR (SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(DD,-(DAY(@BATCH_DATE)-1),@BATCH_DATE) AND DATEADD(S,-1,DATEADD(MM, DATEDIFF(M,0,@BATCH_DATE)+1,0))) OR (HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE)) ) OR PA.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG='Y' ) AND (HISTORY1.PROVIDER_ORG_ID = 5946 ) AND ((PA.END_DATE IS NULL OR PA.END_DATE >= @BATCH_DATE) or (PA.END_DATE < @BATCH_DATE and DATEADD(DAY,30,PA.MODIFIED_DATE) >= @BATCH_DATE)) --PIR 15576 ORDER BY PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID, ISNULL(DEP.DATE_OF_BIRTH,DEPPER.DATE_OF_BIRTH) --AND (PA.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) OR ISNULL(PA.END_DATE,'99991231') <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE))-- Commented to handle future dated enrollment scenario

DECLARE @BATCH_DATE1 DATE SELECT @BATCH_DATE1 = CONVERT(DATE, @BATCH_DATE)
SELECT EMP.*,EMPDET.*,PAEMP.*,ORG.* FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) ON GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL PAEMP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=PAEMP.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL EMPDET WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAEMP.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID=EMPDET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT EMP WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMPDET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID=EMP.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION ORG WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMP.ORG_ID=ORG.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID= (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID --and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) --Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 and end_date is null ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID= (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID and START_DATE < HISTORY1.start_date AND START_DATE != END_DATE --PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID < HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE1) --Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID=12 AND SPA.STATUS_VALUE='VALD' AND ( ( 'ENL2' = CASE WHEN DATEADD(DAY,30,@BATCH_DATE) BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE THEN HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE WHEN HISTORY1.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,30,@BATCH_DATE) THEN HISTORY1.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE END ) OR (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'SUS3' AND ((SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE < DATEADD(S,-1,DATEADD(MM, DATEDIFF(M,0,@BATCH_DATE1)+1,0)) AND ISNULL(GHDV.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG,'N')='Y') OR (SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(DD,-(DAY(@BATCH_DATE1)-1),@BATCH_DATE1) AND DATEADD(S,-1,DATEADD(MM, DATEDIFF(M,0,@BATCH_DATE1)+1,0))) OR (HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND @BATCH_DATE1 BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE)) ) ) AND (EMP.START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE1) OR ISNULL(EMP.END_DATE,'99991231') <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE1)) AND (HISTORY1.PROVIDER_ORG_ID = 5946 ) ORDER BY EMP.PERSON_ID,EMP.START_DATE DESC

SELECT DISTINCT OP.* FROM SGT_ORG_PLAN OP WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT EMP WITH(NOLOCK) ON OP.ORG_ID= EMP.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL EMPDET WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMP.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID=EMPDET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL PAEMP WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMPDET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID=PAEMP.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAEMP.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY1 ON HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID= (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) ----Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY2 ON HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID= (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID and START_DATE < HISTORY1.start_date AND START_DATE != END_DATE --PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID < HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) ----Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) WHERE OP.PLAN_ID=12 AND SPA.PLAN_ID=12 AND SPA.STATUS_VALUE='VALD' AND ( (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2')-- AND SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE)) OR (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'SUS3' AND ((SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE < DATEADD(S,-1,DATEADD(MM, DATEDIFF(M,0,@BATCH_DATE)+1,0)) AND ISNULL(GHDV.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG,'N')='Y') OR (SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(DD,-(DAY(@BATCH_DATE)-1),@BATCH_DATE) AND DATEADD(S,-1,DATEADD(MM, DATEDIFF(M,0,@BATCH_DATE)+1,0))) OR (HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE)) ) ) AND @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN SPA.START_DATE AND ISNULL(SPA.END_DATE,'01/01/2900') AND @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN EMPDET.START_DATE AND ISNULL(EMPDET.END_DATE,'01/01/2900') AND @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN EMP.START_DATE AND ISNULL(EMP.END_DATE,'01/01/2900') AND (@BATCH_DATE BETWEEN OP.PARTICIPATION_START_DATE AND ISNULL(OP.PARTICIPATION_END_DATE,'01/01/2900') OR (OP.PARTICIPATION_START_DATE > @BATCH_DATE AND OP.PARTICIPATION_END_DATE IS NULL)) -- PROD PIR 7769 AND (HISTORY1.PROVIDER_ORG_ID = 5946 )

SELECT * FROM SGT_PERSON_DEPENDENT SPD WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT SPAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAD.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID=SPD.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPAD.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) ON GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID = 12 AND SPD.DEPENDENT_PERSLINK_ID IN ( SELECT SPA.PERSON_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ID=PER.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PLAN_ID=PLN.PLAN_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID= (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) ----Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY HISTORY2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HISTORY2.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID= (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID and START_DATE < HISTORY1.start_date AND START_DATE != END_DATE --PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID < HISTORY1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID and START_DATE <= DATEADD(DAY,60,@BATCH_DATE) ----Added future dated enrollment scenario PIR-933 ORDER BY SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY.START_DATE DESC) LEFT JOIN sgt_person_account_payment_election pape WITH(NOLOCK) on spa.person_account_id = pape.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID=12 AND SPA.STATUS_VALUE='VALD' AND ( (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2') OR (SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'SUS3' AND ((SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE < DATEADD(S,-1,DATEADD(MM, DATEDIFF(M,0,@BATCH_DATE)+1,0)) AND ISNULL(GHDV.IS_MODIFIED_AFTER_BCBS_FILE_SENT_FLAG,'N')='Y') OR (SPA.HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(DD,-(DAY(@BATCH_DATE)-1),@BATCH_DATE) AND DATEADD(S,-1,DATEADD(MM, DATEDIFF(M,0,@BATCH_DATE)+1,0))) OR (HISTORY2.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND @BATCH_DATE BETWEEN HISTORY2.START_DATE AND HISTORY2.END_DATE)) ) ) AND (HISTORY1.PROVIDER_ORG_ID = 5946 ) )

SELECT DISTINCT PER.PERSON_ID, PER.LAST_NAME, PER.FIRST_NAME, ISNULL(PER.MIDDLE_NAME,'') AS MIDDLE_NAME, ISNULL((SELECT DISTINCT TOP 1 SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM SGT_ORG_PLAN_GROUP_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_COVERAGE_REF WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COVERAGE_CODE = PAG.COVERAGE_CODE), CV1.DESCRIPTION) AS LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE, 'Health' AS 'PLAN' FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON PER.PERSON_ID = PA.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV PAG WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAG.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID AND PAG.COVERAGE_CODE NOT IN ('0001','0004','0006','0021','0024','0041','0044','0030','0061','0098') LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY PAGH WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAGH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = PAG.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND PAGH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY PAGH1 WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT PAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAD.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE PAGH1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = PAG.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND (PAD.START_DATE BETWEEN PAGH1.START_DATE AND ISNULL(PAGH1.END_DATE,'01/01/2900')) ORDER BY PAGH1.START_DATE DESC) AND(PA.PLAN_ID = 12 AND PAG.COVERAGE_CODE IN ('0023','0026') AND ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID) < 3)) LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON CV1.CODE_ID = PAG.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_ID AND CV1.CODE_VALUE=PAG.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE
WHERE PA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND PA.PLAN_ID = 12 AND ((PA.START_DATE < @BATCH_RUN_DATE) AND (@BATCH_RUN_DATE < ISNULL(PA.END_DATE,'01/01/2900'))) AND (((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID AND END_DATE IS NULL) = 0) OR ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID) = 0)) -- CHECK FOR INDIVIDUAL COVERAGE WITH DEPENDENT(S) UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT B.PERSON_ID ,B.LAST_NAME ,B.FIRST_NAME ,ISNULL(B.MIDDLE_NAME,'') AS MIDDLE_NAME ,CV1.DESCRIPTION AS LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE ,(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_ID = 17 THEN 'Vision' ELSE 'Dental' END) AS 'PLAN' FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV G WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT A WITH(NOLOCK) ON G.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = A.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_BASE B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.PERSON_ID = B.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT D WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = D.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY PAGH WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAGH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = G.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND PAGH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY PAGH1 WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT PAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAD.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = A.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID --AND PAD.END_DATE IS NULL WHERE PAGH1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = G.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND (PAD.END_DATE BETWEEN PAGH1.START_DATE AND ISNULL(PAGH1.END_DATE,'01/01/2900')) ORDER BY PAGH1.START_DATE DESC) LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON CV1.CODE_ID = G.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_ID AND CV1.CODE_VALUE=G.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE WHERE ((A.PLAN_ID = 16 AND G.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE = 'IN16') OR (A.PLAN_ID = 17 AND G.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE = 'INDV')) AND A.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND D.END_DATE IS NULL AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PERSON_DEPENDENT C WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE C.PERSON_ID = B.PERSON_ID AND C.RELATIONSHIP_VALUE IN ('SPOU','ADCH', 'CHLD', 'LGLG', 'SCLD', 'DSCH', 'GRCH')) UNION ALL -- CHECK FOR INDIVIDUAL & SPOUSE WITH NO SPOUSE DEPENDENT SELECT DISTINCT B.PERSON_ID ,B.LAST_NAME ,B.FIRST_NAME ,ISNULL(B.MIDDLE_NAME,'') AS MIDDLE_NAME ,CV1.DESCRIPTION AS LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE ,(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_ID = 17 THEN 'Vision' ELSE 'Dental' END) AS 'PLAN' FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV G WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT A WITH(NOLOCK) ON G.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = A.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_BASE B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.PERSON_ID = B.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY PAGH WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAGH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = G.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND PAGH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY PAGH1 WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT PAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAD.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = A.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID --AND PAD.END_DATE IS NULL WHERE PAGH1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = G.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND (PAD.END_DATE BETWEEN PAGH1.START_DATE AND ISNULL(PAGH1.END_DATE,'01/01/2900')) ORDER BY PAGH1.START_DATE DESC) LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON CV1.CODE_ID = G.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_ID AND CV1.CODE_VALUE=G.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE WHERE ((A.PLAN_ID = 16 AND G.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE = 'IS16') OR (A.PLAN_ID = 17 AND G.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE = 'INSP')) AND A.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PERSON_DEPENDENT C WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE C.PERSON_ID = B.PERSON_ID AND C.RELATIONSHIP_VALUE = 'SPOU') UNION ALL -- CHECK FOR INDIVIDUAL & CHILD(REN) WITH NO DEPENDENT(S) SELECT DISTINCT B.PERSON_ID ,B.LAST_NAME ,B.FIRST_NAME ,ISNULL(B.MIDDLE_NAME,'') AS MIDDLE_NAME ,CV1.DESCRIPTION AS LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE ,(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_ID = 17 THEN 'Vision' ELSE 'Dental' END) AS 'PLAN' FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV G WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT A WITH(NOLOCK) ON G.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = A.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_BASE B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.PERSON_ID = B.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY PAGH WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAGH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = G.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND PAGH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY PAGH1 WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT PAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAD.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = A.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID --AND PAD.END_DATE IS NULL WHERE PAGH1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = G.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND (PAD.END_DATE BETWEEN PAGH1.START_DATE AND ISNULL(PAGH1.END_DATE,'01/01/2900')) ORDER BY PAGH1.START_DATE DESC) LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON CV1.CODE_ID = G.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_ID AND CV1.CODE_VALUE=G.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE WHERE ((A.PLAN_ID = 16 AND G.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE = 'IC16') OR (A.PLAN_ID = 17 AND G.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE = 'INCH')) AND A.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PERSON_DEPENDENT C WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE C.PERSON_ID = B.PERSON_ID AND C.RELATIONSHIP_VALUE IN ('ADCH', 'CHLD', 'LGLG', 'SCLD', 'DSCH', 'GRCH')) UNION ALL -- CHECK FOR FAMILY COVERAGE WITH NO DEPENDENTS SELECT DISTINCT B.PERSON_ID ,B.LAST_NAME ,B.FIRST_NAME ,ISNULL(B.MIDDLE_NAME,'') AS MIDDLE_NAME ,CV1.DESCRIPTION AS LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE ,(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_ID = 17 THEN 'Vision' ELSE 'Dental' END) AS 'PLAN' FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV G WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT A WITH(NOLOCK) ON G.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = A.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_BASE B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.PERSON_ID = B.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY PAGH WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAGH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = G.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND PAGH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY PAGH1 WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT PAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAD.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = A.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID --AND PAD.END_DATE IS NULL WHERE PAGH1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = G.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND (PAD.END_DATE BETWEEN PAGH1.START_DATE AND ISNULL(PAGH1.END_DATE,'01/01/2900')) ORDER BY PAGH1.START_DATE DESC) LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON CV1.CODE_ID = G.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_ID AND CV1.CODE_VALUE=G.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE WHERE ((A.PLAN_ID = 16 AND G.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE = 'FM16') OR (A.PLAN_ID = 17 AND G.LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE = 'FMLY')) AND A.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PERSON_DEPENDENT C WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE C.PERSON_ID = B.PERSON_ID AND C.RELATIONSHIP_VALUE IN ('ADCH', 'CHLD', 'LGLG', 'SCLD', 'DSCH', 'GRCH', 'SPOU')) ORDER BY PERSON_ID,LAST_NAME,FIRST_NAME,MIDDLE_NAME,'PLAN'

--Member SELECT DISTINCT PER.PERSON_ID FROM SGT_PERSON PER INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA ON PER.PERSON_ID = PA.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT PE ON PE.PERSON_ID = PER.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION ORG ON ORG.ORG_ID = PE.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV ON CV.DATA1 = ORG.ORG_CODE AND CV.CODE_ID = 7022 WHERE PA.PLAN_ID = 12 AND PA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND ((DATEDIFF(MONTH, (CONVERT(DATE, PER.DATE_OF_BIRTH, 103)), @BATCHRUNDATE) = 309) OR (DATEDIFF(MONTH, (CONVERT(DATE, PER.DATE_OF_BIRTH, 103)), @BATCHRUNDATE) = 777))
UNION
--Dependent SELECT DISTINCT PER.PERSON_ID FROM SGT_PERSON PER INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_DEPENDENT DEP ON PER.PERSON_ID = DEP.DEPENDENT_PERSLINK_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_aCCOUNT PA ON PA.PERSON_ID = DEP.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT EMP ON EMP.PERSON_ID = DEP.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION ORG ON ORG.ORG_ID = EMP.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV ON CV.DATA1 = ORG.ORG_CODE AND CV.CODE_ID = 7022 WHERE PA.PLAN_ID = 12 AND DATEDIFF(MONTH, (CONVERT(DATE, PER.DATE_OF_BIRTH, 103)), @BATCHRUNDATE) = 309
